short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens Excalidraw in every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Opens excalidraw.com inside new tab.

If you are tired of seeing the usual new tab and want to pen down your thoughts more freely on a page that is very commonly used, you can use this to open excalidraw inside new tab and do your creative note taking here with all your data being stored locally in localstorage.
